Articles.Content: Joe Biden and Fred Sted. best combo for a duna landing.

Macfrid Kerman

...and i saw a youtube video by KurtJMac where he got German Kerman...

I think I may have mentioned the oddly feminine Ellie and Allison Kerman, bot today I got Munny Kerman. Guess where he's headed?

Duna of course.
Munbus kerman

Mac Kerman. He broke all my solar panels with one jump on Duna (I'm a windows user ).

Edited August 7, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

Some of my favorites that I've gotten:

* Hermes Kerman (has winged space boots)

* Dermal Kerman (related to Epidermal Kerman?)

* Corner Kerman (doesn't like open spaces)

* Orly Kerman (waiting for cousin Yarly to turn up)

* Ermy Kerman (ERMAHGERD)

* Podrod Kerman (I don't know why, it just sounds funny)

Billy-Bobbas Kerman (Badass!)

Spawned around his time was another Billy-something, but I forgot his name.

Billy-bobfurt kerman

Doodzor Kerman

Johngas Kerman

Edited August 8, 2014 by Dooz

In my BTSM save, I used to have the intrepid trio of Bartman, Bartfurt and Bartberry Kerman. They always flew together.

Bartfurt was the first, I just grabbed a random one for a test flight and didn't particularly find the name noteworthy. But then Bartberry showed up for hire, and it was an obvious match made in heaven.

And a few weeks later... he arrived.

The goddamn Bartman.
I just hired Frozon. He's now on his fist tour to my station in Kerbin orbit.

I had Munwise Kerman. I thought I should send him on all my Mun missions, but he was promptly grounded for reckless destruction of equiptment. Seriously, who manages to destroy not one, but two sets of solar panels while moving from one module to another?

In my BTSM save, I used to have the intrepid trio of Bartman, Bartfurt and Bartberry Kerman. They always flew together.

Bartfurt was the first, I just grabbed a random one for a test flight and didn't particularly find the name noteworthy. But then Bartberry showed up for hire, and it was an obvious match made in heaven.

And a few weeks later... he arrived.

The goddamn Bartman.

...

That is not the screenshot that I was looking for.
I got James a couple of days ago. I refer to him as James T. Kerman.

Edlu Kerman.

This can't be a coincidence, it surely a pre-made name.

I also have Jorgee whose name sound close to an activity that I can't explain here(yes, I have a dirty mind ) and destop(and I'm writting this on my desktop).

I got a Roford Kerman. Surprisingly close to a certain mayor of my hometown.

Do not thrust trust* him! Alway check the snake container for... hum.... something looking like grass and remove it.

Otherwise, the others kerbal will alway say "kerbin, we have a problem. We have a fire in the spaceship. No wait! It was just smoke from Roford's thingy.

*yes, I wrote that in the first place.

Edited August 14, 2014 by goldenpeach

I have a lot of the regular names, like Jack, Chad, Gus, Lars, Alan, Mac, Will, Dudley, and more. Then for the female (?) Kerbals, I've got Rosy, Patsy, Romy, and Hallie. The silly names I have include Raygun, Seekin, Lembas, Hadgas, Dilbert, Doodlin and Doodler, Rodan, Seezer (get it?), Seemore, and Danster. Most of the rest make no real sense.

I found a kerbal called throngford

I found a kerbal called throngford

Jonfrey Kerman.

Don't ask me how that was made.

I had Obamah Kerman once, I kid you not. I threw him on a missile and killed him xD
I got a Wherner Kerman once

augustus....

U GODDAMN REPUBLICAN

2 new ones: Derman Kerman and Theory Kerman.

I think Theory's parents might have been scientists?

Favorite: Jeddan Kerman. So far, he's my only kerbal besides the main 3 that has the badS tag in the persistence.

Funniest: Seeman Kerman. Believe me, I was cracking up for days on that one.
I got one called Hallo Kerman. Hallo means "Hello" in German.
One time, in the demo, i got a Seegel and Gilzor Kerman once
I have Dandan Kerman
